Class AbstractGoogleApiOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.social.google.api.impl.AbstractGoogleApiOperations
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DriveTemplate, PlusTemplate, TaskTemplate

    public abstract class AbstractGoogleApiOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract superclass for implementations that work with Google+ APIs.
